name: Gambol Rolls
description:
Roll the Dice, Change the Game

When demon bunnies invade Gambol Rabbit's home, it’s up to him and his shotgun to send them back to Hell. But along with those rascally rabbit invaders came a mysterious die that changed the face of battle when rolled.

Control Gambol as he tries to shoot the die to rack up points, all while dodging his enemies.

Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS — Movement

SPACE — Jump

LEFT CLICK / J — Shoot

P - Pause

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Theme: Roll of the Dice)

Created with: https://sleth.itch.io

Special thanks to the music maker and play testers.

Also thanks to Kenny for providing amazing assets within the public domain: https://kenney.nl/

Comment your high score!
